metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Seller Program Liability and Risk Factors
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers from collecting payments when buyers never receive ordered products.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers from collecting payments when products received are materially different from sellers' descriptions.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling unlawful goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling counterfeit goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling pirated goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling stolen goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling goods in an unlawful manner.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from selling goods in an unethical manner.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from violating the proprietary rights of others.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers in our stores from otherwise violating our policies.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling unlawful goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling counterfeit goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling pirated goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling stolen goods.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling goods in an unlawful manner.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from selling goods in an unethical manner.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from violating the proprietary rights of others.
We maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers through other stores from otherwise violating our policies.
The law relating to the liability of online service providers is currently unsettled.
Governmental agencies have in the past required changes in the way this business is conducted.
Governmental agencies could in the future require changes in the way this business is conducted.
When these policies and processes are circumvented, it can harm our business.
When these policies and processes are circumvented, it can damage our reputation.
When these policies and processes fail to operate sufficiently, it can harm our business.
When these policies and processes fail to operate sufficiently, it can damage our reputation.
We could face civil liability for unlawful activities by our sellers.
We could face criminal liability for unlawful activities by our sellers.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/

text:
##### We Are Impacted by Fraudulent or Unlawful Activities of Sellers

The law relating to the liability of online service providers is currently unsettled. In addition, governmental agencies have in the past and could in the future require changes in the way this business is conducted. Under our seller programs, we maintain policies and processes designed to prevent sellers from collecting payments, fraudulently or otherwise, when buyers never receive the products they ordered or when the products received are materially different from the sellers descriptions, and to prevent sellers in our stores or through other stores from selling unlawful, counterfeit, pirated, or stolen goods, selling goods in an unlawful or unethical manner, violating the proprietary rights of others, or otherwise violating our policies. When these policies and processes are circumvented or fail to operate sufficiently, it can harm our business or damage our reputation and we could face civil or criminal liability for unlawful activities by our sellers.
